subtitleNullable: Analyzing Digital and Physical Retailer Prices
descriptionNullable:
_____
# Video Game Prices 2022
### Analyzing Digital and Physical Retailer Prices
By  [[source]](https://zenodo.org/record/6435086#.Y9Y60tJBwUE)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset provides a comprehensive look at the expected price of video games in 2022 for physical and digital versions from various online retailers and manufacturers. With this data, we can identify trends in the video game market, such as which titles will be most popular and how pricing differences between physical and digital copies may affect consumer purchasing decisions. The dataset includes columns for Origin, Retailer, Manufacturer, Console, Genre, Title as well as Price Currency and Availability to help you analyze the expected upcoming market dynamics. Use this dataset to gain insight into the future of the video game industry and make more informed gaming decisions!

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> This dataset provides a great resource for those interested in price trends in the video game market. With this data, one can compare expected prices of physical and digital versions of the same game from various online retailers and manufacturers across different platforms. Here are some tips on how to use this dataset to understand price trends in the video game market: 
> 
> - Look at origins: Different countries/regions have different expectations when it comes to prices. If a certain game’s digital version is cheaper in one country than other regions, this could be telling about its consumers’ preferences for physical or digital products. 
> - Compare Manufacturers: Are certain companies more likely to offer better deals? Does their product stand out from the rest? Answering these questions will help you determine which manufacturers offer more competitive prices. 
> - Analyze Genre Prices: Is there a particular genre that tends to be priced differently? This will help you gain insights into what kinds of games are preferred by consumers and how they are priced accordingly. 
> - Find Out About Availability: Availability plays an important role in price formation so it is important to investigate if certain retailers or stores had availability issues before determining whether their prices reflect benchmarks or lack thereof compared with competitors'.  
> 
> By following these tips, you should be able to get valuable insights into current and future price trends within the video game industry based on information provided by this dataset!

### Research Ideas
> - Analyzing the trend of prices between physical and digital versions of games over time to determine whether digital or physical offers better value for money.
> - Comparing gaming genres across consoles and platforms in terms of pricing to identify which ones offer the best bargain overall. 
> - Investigating the price differences between different retailers and manufacturers, to determine which company offers the best deals on video games

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://zenodo.org/record/6435086#.Y9Y60tJBwUE)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> **License: [CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) - Public Domain Dedication](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)**
> No Copyright - You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission. [See Other Information](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

### Columns

**File: videgames.csv**
| Column name    | Description                                                    |
|:---------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Origen**     | The origin of the video game. (String)                         |
| **Tienda**     | The retailer from which the video game is being sold. (String) |
| **Fabricante** | The manufacturer of the video game. (String)                   |
| **Consola**    | The console on which the video game is playable. (String)      |
| **Género**     | The genre of the video game. (String)                          |
| **Título**     | The title of the video game. (String)                          |
| **Precio**     | The price of the video game. (Numeric)                         |
| **Moneda**     | The currency in which the video game is priced. (String)       |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [](https://zenodo.org/record/6435086#.Y9Y60tJBwUE).
